DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetic bioavailability characteristic two test formulation ibuprofen rectal administration profile market reference formulation ibuprofen 200 mg ( oral administration ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Ibuprofen widely use analgesic antipyretic adult child . Two ibuprofen suppository formulation develop pediatric use facilitate dosing young age group . This single-dose , balance , randomise , three-period crossover study healthy male female adult volunteer . Each volunteer receive single dose 50 mg ibuprofen suppository , single dose 200 mg ibuprofen suppository single oral dose 200 mg ibuprofen ( tablet ) . There 14 blood sample take 12 hour study period . Concentrations plasma ibuprofen S R enantiomer measure use validated chromatographic method . Standard pharmacokinetic parameter obtain bioavailability basis rate extent drug absorption assess .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer age 18 55 year BMI < 27 kg/m2 Nonsmokers , smoker less 10 cigarette per day Clinically normal vital sign Clinically normal medical history Clinically normal finding physical examination Clinically normal finding haematology clinical chemistry blood urine show clinically insignificant deviation Screening result drug abuse ( take within 14 day study start ) must negative opiate , cannabinoids , amphetamine , methamphetamine , benzodiazepine cocaine HIV Hepatitis B C test , take within previous 14 day study start , must negative Appropriate use effective method contraception ( female volunteer ) . Paracetamol allow 72 hour prior either study period . The oral contraceptive pill allow .
